subscribe_batch

java.util.List<Publication> subscribe_batch(Subscription subscription,
                                            int startingVerion,
                                            int length)
                                            throws NetworkException
Retrieves a list of already published subscriptions based on versions, ordered from oldest to newest.

Parameters:
subscription - contains the scope and rendezvous id
startingVerion - the first version requested
length - the size of the list to be returned
Returns:
a list of publications ordered from oldest to newest
Throws:
NetworkException

subscribe_non_block

Publication subscribe_non_block(Subscription subscription)
                                throws NetworkException
Subscribes to a publication in non-blocking mode. Returns the publication if it has already been published, otherwise it returns null.

Parameters:
subscription -
Returns:
The publication already published
Throws:
NetworkException - in case of error

subscribe_sync

Publication subscribe_sync(Subscription subscription,
                           long timeout)
                           throws NetworkException,
                                  java.lang.InterruptedException
Subscribes to a publication and waits for timeout milliseconds

Parameters:
subscription -
timeout -
Returns:
Returns the publication read or null if no publication arrived after timeout milliseconds
Throws:
NetworkException
java.lang.InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while waiting
